title: Any chance of adding a .gitignore file?
body:
by **tav@espians.com**: 
I've been maintaining a Go mirror at GitHub for a while now:

* http://github.com/tav/go

Is there any chance of adding a .gitignore file upstream? I could add one myself, but
then it'd generate a merge commit every time...

I've attached a file which mimics the existing .hgignore file.

Sorry for any hassle and thank you.
Attachments: 1. gitignore (878 bytes)
